languages.text: Поросший мерзкой плесенью медицинский сервитор был вооружен рукой с длинными шприцами вместо пальцев. В баках еще плещется дурно пахнущая смесь — мощнейшее успокоительное.

traits.locale_text: Поросший мерзкой плесенью медицинский сервитор был вооружен рукой с длинными шприцами вместо пальцев. В баках еще плещется дурно пахнущая смесь — мощнейшее успокоительное.

languages.text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.
languages.original_text: Поросший мерзкой плесенью медицинский сервитор был вооружен рукой с длинными шприцами вместо пальцев. В баках еще плещется дурно пахнущая смесь — мощнейшее успокоительное.

traits.locale_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

languages.text: 这只长满霉菌的医疗机仆手上没有手指，而是插满了长长的针筒。桶里装着某种散发恶臭味道的物质，那是一种药性极强的镇定剂。
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: 这只长满霉菌的医疗奴工手上没有手指，而是插满了长长的针筒。桶里装着某种散发恶臭味道的物质，那是一种药性极强的镇定剂。

languages.text: El servidor médico, ahora cubierto de un moho inmundo, estaba equipado con una mano que tenía jeringuillas en vez de dedos. Un líquido hediondo aún salpica en su interior: es un poderoso sedante.
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: El servidor médico, ahora cubierto de un moho inmundo, estaba equipado con una mano que tenía jeringuillas en vez de dedos. Un líquido hediondo aún salpica en su interior: es un poderoso sedante.

languages.text: 今やカビに覆われたメディカル・サーヴィターは、指の代わりに長い注射器をもった手を装備していた。樽の中には悪臭を放つ物質が揺れている。非常に強力な鎮静剤だ。
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: 今やカビに覆われたメディカル・サーヴィターは、指の代わりに長い注射器をもった手を装備していた。樽の中には悪臭を放つ物質が揺れている。非常に強力な鎮静剤だ。

languages.text: Der jetzt mit faulendem Schimmel bedeckte Medizin-Servitor war mit einer Hand bestückt, die statt Fingern lange Injektionsnadeln hatte. In den Fässern befindet sich immer noch eine übelriechende Substanz – ein extrem starkes Beruhigungsmittel.
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: Der jetzt mit faulendem Schimmel bedeckte Medizin-Servitor war mit einer Hand bestückt, die statt Fingern lange Injektionsnadeln hatte. In den Fässern befindet sich immer noch eine übelriechende Substanz – ein extrem starkes Beruhigungsmittel.

languages.text: Recouvert d'une moisissure répugnante, ce servitor médical a des seringues à la place des doigts. Elles renferment toujours une substance nauséabonde, visiblement un puissant sédatif.
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: Recouvert d'une moisissure répugnante, ce servitor médical a des seringues à la place des doigts. Elles renferment toujours une substance nauséabonde, visiblement un puissant sédatif.

languages.text: Pis bir küfle kaplanmış hâldeki bu sıhhiyeci hizmetörün elinin birinde parmak yerine uzun şırıngalar var. Haznelerin içinde hâlâ o kötü kokulu maddeden, son derece güçlü sakinleştiriciden var.
languages.original_text: The medical servitor now covered in foul mould was equipped with a hand bristling with long syringes instead of fingers. A foul-smelling substance still sloshes around inside the barrels — an extremely potent sedative.

traits.locale_text: Pis bir küfle kaplanmış hâldeki bu sıhhiyeci servitörün elinin birinde parmak yerine uzun şırıngalar var. Haznelerin içinde hâlâ o kötü kokulu maddeden, son derece güçlü sakinleştiriciden var.
